price: Ampa sε, apapafoͻ no bεnom kuruwa bi mu a, (emu nsuo no) deε yεde afra ne ‘Kaafuur’ anaasε Kamfa.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna al-abrāra yashrabūna min kasin kāna mizājuhā kāfūran
